html: Many of the Senators who spoke tonight in favor of the bill said that the only thing standing in the way of Blue Water Navy veterans receiving the benefits they earned was the U.S. Senate. They are right.
text: Many of the Senators who spoke tonight in favor of the bill said that the only thing standing in the way of Blue Water Navy veterans receiving the benefits they earned was the U.S. Senate. They are right.

html: It is especially troubling to see this bill blocked when there is so much work left to do on toxic exposures as a whole, to include those exposed to burn pits and radiologically exposed veterans.
text: It is especially troubling to see this bill blocked when there is so much work left to do on toxic exposures as a whole, to include those exposed to burn pits and radiologically exposed veterans.

html: But it’s disheartening to see a bill that passed unanimously by the House blocked by a handful of Senators over supposed fiscal concerns when those same Senators voted to add trillions of dollars to the deficit last year to score a political win on the back of American taxpayers.
text: But it’s disheartening to see a bill that passed unanimously by the House blocked by a handful of Senators over supposed fiscal concerns when those same Senators voted to add trillions of dollars to the deficit last year to score a political win on the back of American taxpayers.

html: I have been working on this bill since it was first introduced several Congresses ago. We have come a long way and are almost at the finish line.

html: All too often politicians will say that veterans deserve everything we can give them and more; that we owe veterans a debt we can never repay.  Well, today we saw politicians fail to live up to those promises and renege on paying that debt.
text: All too often politicians will say that veterans deserve everything we can give them and more; that we owe veterans a debt we can never repay.  Well, today we saw politicians fail to live up to those promises and renege on paying that debt.

html: The U.S. Government wrote this check to the Blue Water Navy veterans 40 years ago when we exposed these service members to Agent Orange.  It’s far past time for us to pay up and live up to the trust that these men and women put in their government.

html: Senator John McCain embodied what Americans ought to expect from our leaders: decency, civility, and respect. We are forever in his debt and it’s up to us to carry on his legacy of patriotism.
text: Senator John McCain embodied what Americans ought to expect from our leaders: decency, civility, and respect. We are forever in his debt and it’s up to us to carry on his legacy of patriotism.

html: Our strength as Americans lies in our unity. Together, we stand strong. Divided, we fall. Senator McCain didn't just believe in this fundamental American truth, he lived it all the days of his life.
text: Our strength as Americans lies in our unity. Together, we stand strong. Divided, we fall. Senator McCain didn't just believe in this fundamental American truth, he lived it all the days of his life.

html: Senator McCain understood that we are first and foremost Americans. During his memorial service today, that sentiment rang all throughout the Cathedral.
text: Senator McCain understood that we are first and foremost Americans. During his memorial service today, that sentiment rang all throughout the Cathedral.

html: As it stands, current budget caps won’t allow for the level of spending the VA MISSION Act calls for ($47B) without deep cuts to other vital VA programs, such as those that invest in VA infrastructure, direct patient care, suicide prevention, medical research, and job training.
text: As it stands, current budget caps won’t allow for the level of spending the VA MISSION Act calls for ($47B) without deep cuts to other vital VA programs, such as those that invest in VA infrastructure, direct patient care, suicide prevention, medical research, and job training.

html: Congress has until the end of FY2019 to find a solution to the VA MISSION Act funding shortage. Regrettably, multiple proposals offered by my fellow Democrats and me to fix the funding issues have yet to be advanced, leaving critical existing VA services at risk of cuts.

I urge swift passage of our bill and will continue to fight for MN seniors by protecting their Medicare from disruption and Republican attempts to target the program for cuts.

html: Our unanswered 2017 requests of the Trump admin include: • the steps CMS has taken to provide flexibility and info to Minnesotans • the steps CMS will be taking to ensure a timely notice of #Medicare changes • details from CMS on the regulatory options to limit disruption
text:
Our unanswered 2017 requests of the Trump admin include:
 
• the steps CMS has taken to provide flexibility and info to Minnesotans
• the steps CMS will be taking to ensure a timely notice of #Medicare changes
• details from CMS on the regulatory options to limit disruption

html: Currently, over half of all #Medicare Cost plan beneficiaries live in MN. As it stands, an estimated 300k+ Medicare recipients in 70 of MN’s 87 counties will be transitioning from Medicare Cost plans to Medicare Advantage plans on January 1, 2019 if the transition is not delayed.
text: Currently, over half of all #Medicare Cost plan beneficiaries live in MN. As it stands, an estimated 300k+ Medicare recipients in 70 of MN’s 87 counties will be transitioning from Medicare Cost plans to Medicare Advantage plans on January 1, 2019 if the transition is not delayed.

html: Our legislation to #ProtectMedicare will delay the transition of #Medicare Cost plan beneficiaries to Medicare Advantage plans from 2019 to 2021. We owe Minnesota seniors the answers, direction, peace of mind, and health coverage and care they deserve.
text:
Our legislation to #ProtectMedicare will delay the transition of #Medicare Cost plan beneficiaries to Medicare Advantage plans from 2019 to 2021.
 
We owe Minnesota seniors the answers, direction, peace of mind, and health coverage and care they deserve.

html: Due to the Trump administration’s failure to address concerns we raised in 2017 about the potential disruption of health coverage for over 300,000 Minnesota seniors, Rep. Collin Peterson and I are introducing the #ProtectMedicare for Seniors Act of 2018 today.
text: Due to the Trump administration’s failure to address concerns we raised in 2017 about the potential disruption of health coverage for over 300,000 Minnesota seniors, Rep. Collin Peterson and I are introducing the #ProtectMedicare for Seniors Act of 2018 today.

text: After #HVAC passage of the #BlueWaterNavy Vietnam Vets Act today, nearly 90k vets exposed to #AgentOrange are closer than ever to receiving the care and benefits they deserve. Having fought for these vets for years, I’m proud we’re on track to finally fulfill our promise to them.

html: I couldn’t be more proud to author the VA Medicinal #Cannabis Research Act. It’s time for @DeptVetAffairs to finally #dotheresearch so our vets get the answers on #medicalcannabis they deserve. I call on @SpeakerRyan to bring this bipartisan bill to the Floor for a vote ASAP.
text:
I couldn’t be more proud to author the VA Medicinal #Cannabis Research Act. It’s time for @DeptVetAffairs to finally #dotheresearch so our vets get the answers on #medicalcannabis they deserve.

I call on @SpeakerRyan to bring this bipartisan bill to the Floor for a vote ASAP.

html: By authorizing @DeptVetAffairs to advance scientific and medical research into the safety and efficacy of #cannabis usage by vets living with post-traumatic stress disorder (#PTSD) and #chronicpain, the VA #MedicinalCannabis Research Act answers the call of over 92% of our vets.pic.twitter.com/v25FtHCLXN
text: By authorizing @DeptVetAffairs to advance scientific and medical research into the safety and efficacy of #cannabis usage by vets living with post-traumatic stress disorder (#PTSD) and #chronicpain, the VA #MedicinalCannabis Research Act answers the call of over 92% of our vets.pic.twitter.com/v25FtHCLXN

html: #NationalWalkoutDay is a call to action. Many Dems are hearing the call, but not enough Republicans in Congress are getting the message. We were sent to Washington to get things done. Now let’s advance commonsense gun safety measures we can agree on. Answer the call, @HouseGOP.
text:
#NationalWalkoutDay is a call to action. Many Dems are hearing the call, but not enough Republicans in Congress are getting the message.

We were sent to Washington to get things done. Now let’s advance commonsense gun safety measures we can agree on.

Answer the call, @HouseGOP.

html: Keeping students safe in our schools must be a top priority. I supported the STOP School Violence Act today b/c it is a step in the right direction, but it is not enough. As we’ve heard from students all across the nation, Congress must work together on commonsense gun safety.
text:
Keeping students safe in our schools must be a top priority. I supported the STOP School Violence Act today b/c it is a step in the right direction, but it is not enough.

As we’ve heard from students all across the nation, Congress must work together on commonsense gun safety.

html: Thank you to the student leaders who have chosen to stand up and #walkout together for commonsense gun safety laws. Your voices are being heard. Congress must act to protect our schools from gun violence while upholding the 2A rights of law-abiding citizens. #NationalWalkoutDaypic.twitter.com/s3oUA6FYQt
text:
Thank you to the student leaders who have chosen to stand up and #walkout together for commonsense gun safety laws. Your voices are being heard.

Congress must act to protect our schools from gun violence while upholding the 2A rights of law-abiding citizens.

#NationalWalkoutDaypic.twitter.com/s3oUA6FYQt
